reviews.text: Do not believe the bad reviews. The food is very good. If you‚Äôre respectful to the workers they will be respectful back. Been there a couple times and it was fine

They served me potato salad balled up in aluminum foil instead of a container. When I complained, they gave me two empty containers and no fix. Unsafe, unprofessional, and disrespectful ‚Äî I‚Äôve already reported them to the Department of Health.

I asked her if she takes card and she said yes, then when we got to the register she said she doesn‚Äôt take card. I walked out without purchasing and won‚Äôt be going back.

Well I can‚Äôt speak for the service because i never entered the establishment. However I got a large oxtail with white rice and mac n cheese for about $25. Of course I‚Äôve had better tasting oxtail from others, but what made me take the time out to even write this review is the simple fact that it took an extra 15min for me to eat at least 1/2 of this meal. The amount of thyme stems/roots that I found was noticeably annoying. I couldn‚Äôt enjoy ONE BITE of food without removing a rather large ‚Äústick‚Äù or ‚Äústem‚Äù of whatever herb was used. Another dishonorable mention would be the Mac n cheese‚Ä¶why is it sweet?

This place is disgusting! Charged me 9$ for a small jerk chicken however the chicken was days old chicken taken off the grill! Dry and crisp. Damn near charcoal. Do not buy their jerk chicken if you still decide to go. And the funny part is I asked the chef if the chicken is good and he said yes.
This restaurant was great. 10 years ago. I recently went this week let‚Äôs just say this, I would never return

I just bought a cow foot soup from here and I‚Äôm going extremely disappointed. No Cow foot in the soup and it was poorly prepared.
$10.50 and a waste. Not to mention the customer service was horrible. They‚Äôre acting like I‚Äôm begging them for the soup. Never again!

I have been enjoying the fruits of the cooks, servers, and front-end staff's labor for years. Over 5 years. Since becoming a teacher, I am required to leave home earlier, compared to my schedule in previous years. For the past 2 years, I look forward to visiting Simmer Down restaurant to purchase my breakfast.

The variety and delicious food selections are abundant. The cook has gifted hands. The servers are pleasant and attentive as I communicate my order. The cashier, usually an assertive, stern Caribbean woman with a serious facial expression and a gentle approach to customers, ensures customers are aware of the cost of orders. She also ensures optimal financial gains for Summer Down, as she could be heard informing her colleagues of the accurate costs of products.

Simmer Down is worth visiting for breakfast, lunch, or dinner. I particularly enjoy that music is played throughout the day, rather than the news. Music adds a warm welcome upon entering the restaurant.

While I've tried every dish excluding the shellfish, I recommend the vegetable chow mein, curry chicken w/potato, macaroni salad, and plantains. The cornmeal porridge and bread and bun are always fresh and well good.

Edit on January 22, 2024: I recommend making all purchases with cash. This establishment apply a surcharge for all debit/credit card transactions. Sometimes up to .89 which is significant compared to other businesses.
Food is great and everyone is always friendly. I‚Äôve ordered here for several functions.
Wonderful food is delicious. Service is perfect. They are warm & friendly work is excellent.
